roleset.name: adjoin two objects
roleset.note: Based on Thyme and Sharp data. Comparison to join.01.Join.01 is a member of VN class mix-22.1-2-1. Framed by Katie.

example.name: arg 2 rather than arg 3 because the gun is being adjoined to 'them', not used as string.
example.text: Plasma guns are [the logical weapon-1] to PRO tandem them [with *-1].
